data.name: Youtube clone using React Js and redux
data.description: Implemented a collapsible Sidebar for easy navigation, dynamic real-time data fetching from the YouTube API for the latest videos, improved app scalability and state management with Redux Toolkit, and added a Shimmer effect for enhanced user experience.

data.name: Netflix-GPT
data.description: Designed secure Login/SignUp forms with validation, integrated Firebase for authentication, real-time database, and production deployment, applied Tailwind-CSS for visual appeal, optimized state management with Redux Toolkit, centralized hardcoded values in constants, added redirects for proper navigation based on login status, and built a dynamic header with seamless app routing.

data.name: Redux cart
data.description: I created a shopping cart project using React and Redux, implementing state management with Redux for handling cart operations efficiently and ensuring a smooth user experience.
